katunayaka nidahas welandakalapaye smart shart kamhal jalaye thawath kamhal kihipayaka kamkaru rakiya anathure apage warthakaruwan, 11 juni 2020 pawathna samithi aprasadayata path wu wita “sampradayika kramawalin bahara” yayi pawasamin thawath wruththiya samithiyak goda naga kamkaruwan mula kirime ath dakim welanda kalapaye kamkaruwan sathuwa pawathi. 1960 gananwala shon-lu godage chithrapatawala ranga pa ana karina 79 weni wiye di miya yayi dewing wolsh, 11 juni 2020 pransa-suwis adhyakshaka shon-lu godage mul chithrapatawala rangapama gana wadath prasiddhiyata path wu ana karina namathi denmarkaye upan niliya, pasugiya desambar 14 weni da, pilika rogayen, parisiye aarogya shalawaka di miyagiya ya.
